flavorText: The continent of Guul Draz is a geothermal swampland reeking of heat and decay.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Kontinent Guul Draz ist ein geothermisches Sumpfland, in dem die Luft vor Hitze und fauligem Gestank flimmert.
foreignData.name: Schwelendes Marschland
foreignData.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}.)
Das Schwelende Marschland kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder mehr Standardländer.

foreignData.flavorText: El continente de Guul Draz es una ciénaga geotérmica que respira calor y putrefacción.

foreignData.text:
({T}: Agrega {B} o {R}.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le continent de Guul Draz est un marais géothermique, puant de chaleur et de décomposition.

foreignData.flavorText: Il continente di Guul Draz è un terreno geotermico paludoso che puzza di afa e putrefazione.

({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}.)
La Palude Rovente entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli due o più terre base.

foreignData.flavorText: グール・ドラズ大陸は温沼地である。地熱による高温と腐敗で燻っている。

foreignData.text:
（{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。）
あなたが２つ以上の基本土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、燻る湿地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreignData.flavorText: O continente de Guul Draz é um pântano geotérmico que fede a mofo e podridão.

({T}: Adicione {B} ou {R}.)

foreignData.flavorText: Континент Гуул-Драз — разогретое подземным теплом болото, от которого исходят душные гнилостные пары.

name: Smoldering Marsh
originalText:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Smoldering Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

rulings.text: Even though these lands have basic land types, they are not basic lands because “basic” doesn't appear on their type line. Notably, controlling two or more of them won't allow others to enter the battlefield untapped.

However, because these cards have basic land types, effects that specify a basic land type without also specifying that the land be basic can affect them. For example, a spell or ability that reads “Destroy target Forest” can target Canopy Vista, while one that reads “Destroy target basic Forest” cannot.
If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of basic lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
